tensordb.TensorClient.read¶

TensorClient.read(path: str, **kwargs) → xarray.core.dataarray.DataArray¶

Lazy read of a file using Xarray.

Parameters
path: str

Location of your stored tensor.

**kwargs

Parameters used for the internal FileStorage that you choose.
